data.text: @katiecouric There are huge possibilities for healing using the latest in neuroscience and research from evidenced-based Mind Body Program for Cancer detailed in my book, Cancer as a Love Story:  https://t.co/oWpJVldXTe
@katiecouric That's not a cause for celebration. As a smoker, you're  still at a high rate of developing some kind of cancer, katie. https://t.co/9baOhej1iv
@katiecouric I was diagnosed in 2011 with stage 1 & had the onkotype test on my tumor, which came back with a high score, determining that I needed chemo.  Grateful!!
@katiecouric The most common reason for breast cancer is deodorant and antiperspirant. More male breast cancer here than any other country by far!
